verses.verse: A Song, a Psalm of Asaph. O <S%H430>God<s%>, keep not thou <S%H8252>silence<s%>: Hold not thy <S%H2790>peace<s%>, and be not <S%H8252>still<s%>, O <S%H410>God<s%>.
For <S%H341><s%>, lo, thine enemies make a <S%H1993>tumult<s%>; And they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee have lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%>.
Thy take <S%H6191>crafty<s%> <S%H5475>counsel<s%> against thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, And <S%H3289>consult<s%> together against thy hidden <S%H6845>ones<s%>.

They have <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us cut them <S%H3582>off<s%> from being a <S%H1471>nation<s%>; That the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may be no more in <S%H2142>remembrance<s%>.
For they have <S%H3289>consulted<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> with one <S%H3820>consent<s%>; Against thee do they <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%>:
The <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> and the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%>; <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and the <S%H1905>Hagarenes<s%>;
Gebal <S%H1381><s%>, and <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>; <S%H6429>Philistia<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>:
Assyria <S%H804><s%> also is <S%H3867>joined<s%> with <S%H2220>them<s%>; They have helped the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>
Do <S%H6213><s%> thou unto them as unto <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, As to <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, as to <S%H2985>Jabin<s%>, at the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon<s%>;
Who <S%H8045>perished<s%> at <S%H5874>Endor<s%>, Who became as <S%H1828>dung<s%> for the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
Make <S%H7896><s%> their <S%H5081>nobles<s%> like <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%>; <S%H5257>Yea<s%>, all their princes like <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>;
Who <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us take to ourselves in <S%H3423>possession<s%> The <S%H4999>habitations<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
O my <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H7896>make<s%> them like the <S%H1534>whirling<s%> <S%H7179>dust<s%>; As stubble <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>.
As the <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H1197>burneth<s%> the <S%H3293>forest<s%>, And as the <S%H3852>flame<s%> that <S%H3857>setteth<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> on <S%H3857>fire<s%>,
So <S%H7291>pursue<s%> them with thy <S%H5591>tempest<s%>, And <S%H926>terrify<s%> them with thy <S%H5492>storm<s%>.
Fill <S%H4390><s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> with <S%H7036>confusion<s%>, That they may <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Let them be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> and <S%H926>dismayed<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>; <S%H2659>Yea<s%>, let them be confounded and <S%H6>perish<s%>;
That they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou <S%H8034>alone<s%>, whose name is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Art the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> over all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
